name: In the Hands of the People
name_original: In the Hands of the People
description:
My first game, made for the Global Game Jam in 2016. Presented as it was completed back then. This is the original project that Flag for Freedom was a "remix" of.

Raise the flag by jacking off. Game does not have a reset. 

Designed as my middle finger to the Oregon Occupiers. May they wank off forever.
